00067 
00068 number_of_insulator_beetween_electrodes=number_of_electrodes;
00069 % Memory allocation
00070 Electrodes_vector=repmat(Sensor_element_circular,1,number_of_electrodes);
00071 Insulator2_vector=repmat(Sensor_element_circular,1,number_of_insulator_beetween_electrodes);
00072 
00073 
00074 electrode_angle=360/(number_of_electrodes*(1+(1/ratio_electrode_to_insulator)));
00075 insulator2_angle=360/(number_of_electrodes*(1+ratio_electrode_to_insulator));
00076 
00077 for p=1:1:number_of_electrodes;
00078     Insulator2_vector(p)=...
00079         Sensor_element_circular(...
00080         start_ins2_angle+(p-1)*insulator2_angle+(p-1)*electrode_angle, ...
00081         start_ins2_angle+(p)*insulator2_angle+(p-1)*electrode_angle, ...
00082         electrode_min_r,electrode_min_r+electrode_thick,dg,'none',2,'ins2');
00083 
00084     Electrodes_vector(p)=...
00085         Sensor_element_circular(...
00086         start_ins2_angle+(p)*insulator2_angle+(p-1)*electrode_angle,...
00087         start_ins2_angle+(p)*insulator2_angle+(p)*electrode_angle,...
00088         electrode_min_r,electrode_min_r+electrode_thick,dg,12,10000,'electrode');
00089 end
00090 
00091 % Insulator 3
00092 ins3_min_r=electrode_min_r+electrode_thick;
00093 ins3=Sensor_element_circular(0,360,ins3_min_r,ins3_min_r+ins3_thick,dg,'none',2,'ins3');
00094 
00095 % Screen
00096 scrn_min_r=ins3_min_r+ins3_thick;
00097 scrn=Sensor_element_circular(0,360,scrn_min_r,scrn_min_r+screen_thick,dg,0,10000,'screen');
00098

00104 % s.add_element(ins1);
00105

00108     s.add_element(Insulator2_vector(i));
00109 end

00113

00116         s.add_element(Electrodes_vector(i));

00119 %phantom_gen=Phantom_generator_2D(fov,'ask_me',0,pha_perm,d_mm,D_mm);
